dream("We found the perfect property in New York. Old Victorian, with a huge garden and a bright red structure. All of the rooms were big and square.  However we make the decision to leave New York and head back to Australia. But I decide to take our new house with me, rolling up the garden and each of the rooms .  There are no flights available so we have to put the house inside a small plane. Now I’m by myself, flying in a small plane back to Australia with our dream house rolled up inside. Nobody came with me. I am filled with terror  and immediately regret my decision. Why did I roll up our dream home ? It would have been the perfect house to live out the quarantine in.", {mode:"visual", text:"minimal"})

dream("We found the perfect property in New York. Old Victorian, with a huge garden and a bright red structure. Why did I roll up our dream home ? It would have been the perfect house to live out the quarantine in.", {mode:"visual", text:false, art:"ansii_emoji_ascii"})
